post.body: Hello ZeroMe!
yey developing another random site: https://gitlab.com/l4v4ph0x/dream-chat
so i used KxoVid today and uploaded music spectrum vid ^^
and we r finally sending messages on Dream Chat ツ
yey, got working a basic image sending (also encrypted) on Dream Chat ^^
added function (to Dream Chat ^^) to send message if receiver is offline and user gets message once both sides are online, little question also: who likes function to edit sent message

im baaack .. and with zite update ofc
[Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) :
* updated crawled data
* added quick answers : sha1, sha256, sha512 and ripemd160
voilaaa , [Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) can search real deep now ^^ even in zerotalk posts

a little update for [eh anime ?](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/) site as well (reached optional data as anime video files to 204398.51MB ^^)
* updated Circlet Princess subbed to episode 12
* updated Black Clover dubbed to episode 97
* added FLCL Progressive dubbed
* added A Day Before Us subbed
* added A Day Before Us 2 subbed
* added The Irregular at Magic High School subbed
* added Gosick dubbed
* added Dororo subbed
* added Toradora dubbed
* added Inu x Boku SS dubbed
* added Inu x Boku SS Special dubbed
* added Blue Exorcist dubbed
* added Kizumonogatari I
* added Kizumonogatari II
* added Kizumonogatari III
* added Nekomonogatari: Kuro subbed

note that after Toradora may not start as fast ud want to since spreading out to others takes time first :P
is it good idea to let search engine crawler into zerome ?

and so ive added [PornographyBlocklist by ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13CgSQeywg2ius5pjXVCk7dKUCRkz5xvW3/) to [Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) , by default its enabled and anyone who wants to search even deeper has to disable "block list" from settings

[eh anime ?](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/) update came again ^^
* added Domestic Girlfriend dubbed
* added Bakemonogatari subbed
* added Monogatari Series Second Season subbed
* added Nisemonogatari subbed
* added Overlord dubbed
* added Overlord II dubbed
* added Overlord III dubbed
* added Owarimonogatari subbed
* added Ingress the Animation dubbed
* update Black Clover dubbed to episode 100

and i have picked up old project again ^^, since project got way too big i had to create js framework that works with zeronet to manage various views in page. i hope this design looks way better than old too :D

and ive started creating music listening site that is also using lavatube a javascript framework that manages various views in page.
this site will provide high quality music only ^^ right now theres only 92 lossless audio files and max 50 will be shown when searching ( full list for now http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KAQudiYXk5r2Q5nZHnq4Mgy4sB4L8862/song-list.txt )
and since ive put only 20 hours into this site then most of functionality in ui doesnt even work :D wut works is only searching, playing music, creating, deleting, change title of playlist, volume slider, language change (no save tho) and about page :P
and site addr is if u have any interest looking up how lavatube is working http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KAQudiYXk5r2Q5nZHnq4Mgy4sB4L8862

no im not dead, just being lazy as always :P  buut ive took lil time and added few functionalities to this new site ive created called "Dreams Station" .. new functionalities: add music to playlist, play playlist and display all search results, oh this menu thingy is new also ^^

i've changed [Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) results displaying so that popular links are raised up. it's early test and kindly provide your valuable feedback
lil idea to create wikipedia mirror since some countries censorship, wut do u think abut that idea or has someone already done it

[eh anime ?](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/) update came again ^^
* added Dr. Stone dubbed
* added The Rising of the Shield Hero dubbed
* added By the Grace of the Gods dubbed
* added Tower of God dubbed
* added Shirobako dubbed
* added Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road subbed
* added Sword Art Online Alicization dubbed
* added Beastars dubbed
* added The Promised Neverland dubbed
crawler has reached 270k links, double the previous run and so [Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) got update too with better popularity raiteing

[eh anime ?](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/) letz try to start weekly updates, and so here's February 1st week update
* Dies Irae: The Dawning Days dubbed
* Dies irae: dubbed
* Dies Irae: To the Ring Reincarnation dubbed
* Afro Samurai dubbed
* Kakegurui dubbed
* 18if dubbed
* Mob Psycho 100 dubbed
* Mob Psycho 100 subbed
* Mob Psycho 100 II dubbed
* Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha subbed
* Puella Magi Madoka Magica dubbed
* Kanojo to Kanojo no Neko: Everything Flows dubbed
* Love Live! School Idol Project dubbed
* Sword Art Online Alicization - War of Underworld dubbed
* Sword Art Online: Alicization - War of Underworld Part 2 dubbed
* Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto dubbed
* Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- dubbed
* BNA dubbed
thanks to compression [Dream Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) can now parse 20k links in 10mb zite

comment.body: trying to install some solar panels
@Againandagain: house roof, and more like hobby project to zero electricity draw from grid, yey green energy comes from thin air ^^
@Againandagain: woah making battery bank seem hassle, im super lazy and i just bought lifeypo4 winstons, super expensive tho :P
i joined zerome :D
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: yup yup :P, didnt want to lose quality, gonna try to reduce next time ^^
run command git clone [addr of repo] in terminal ?
@Smopro: checked out and had same prob :P
path of exile
opensuse
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: i dont want to release unready project so that ppl will get disappointed, it still has major bugs in code and design :P
noice
tested !
look at my fish, my fish is amazing ^^

@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: and i've finally made https://tree.taiga.io/project/l4v4ph0x-dream-chat/kanban if zeronet has something similar let me know :) .. so u know theres still something left in order to go public
tested ^^
@Jaoheah: site should be responsive already, or if u do have pic of elems misplacement then id like to see, since i havent noticed any myself :P
@katian_on_mars: not long at least i hope, like i get results in 3 seconds
@katian_on_mars: ty , tested and i found bug , now its fixed

@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: i only accept sites that follow crawler criterion to avoid duplicate, abandoned, ... sites, and if u have added search engine to firefox then yup u should be able to search from there (no search suggestions tho)
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: yeah, i need better idea how to give score so results can be filtered wuts top most, also it cant be complicated like regex search or it will takes way too long to search

@Moor: im kinda lazy to filer out sites my self, buut if ima depend on some other block list then i might add functionality to use block list by default, is it really horrible without block list ?

abut filtering thing out if u mean "Please sign in ━ new comment ... " then its not bad notice ^^
@Moor: thats right , no filter by crawler side

@Git Center: good suggestion :) , im thinking/making new algorithm already , mean while any new suggestions r appreciated , also old score giving function can be found in [Search.js at line 125](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/lib/Search.js)
@Ansho Rei: beginners curse :P ill try to think something that raises ranking sites at the end of this week
@Saintian: uses bigfiles to stream ^^ and seeders are 2 to 4 usually
@Saintian: its more like streaming where i check quality of video and re render before uploading and its missing functionality for others to upload :P
@Ayes: from where u r ?
u sure
how did u, soo ur plan didnt went as planned :P
first answer to question how
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: yeah takes time when crawler finds enough references to this post, surprisingly its damn long process and my first time writing crawler :P
@柒月落雪: oi, im lava. that's long time ago but rply is rply ^^
welcome baaaaack

@Kixun: ive been thinking to add that functionality yup since theres hardly any possibility for myself to keep up :P
i hope to get something working in 2 weeks. how many anime do u have :D
@Bankruptcy: 0.0 someone uses it ^^ yup yup i have ZeroMail
@Bankruptcy: yup yup same ZeroID, and i dont know any other simple private texting way in zeronet
@Kixun: oh, you can post these torrents magnet links here or zero mail me

@Zaranthel: all i can say is it can take 20 minutes to load up first time. if u drag zeronet logo from right top and scroll down, do u see jpg and mp4 files in "NEEDS TO BE UPDATED" section. or if u check browser console log does it show errors like unsupported codec maybe
test completed
in early ios14 apple included notification when clipboard data got pasted and everytime i opened discord i got notification like "discord copied from firefox" :D
@Bankruptcy: i have discord :D
@redandblack: a truly decentralized one
@Orien3242: if u have torrent/magnet links then u can share them yup yup or if u have suggestions wut anime to add or how to modify site then u can write them here or zeromail me too ^^
